function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of compliance with social distancing measures","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, higher risk of infection","Mitigation":"Enforcement of regulations, public awareness campaigns, and community engagement","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, social distancing monitoring tools","People":"General population, social media users","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, social media platforms"},{"Description":"Response biases in self-reported compliance data","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of population compliance, leading to ineffective policymaking","Mitigation":"Use of objective data sources, cross-validation with multiple data sets, and statistical corrections","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, objective data collection methods","People":"Researchers, policymakers, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, government, data collection organizations"},{"Description":"Trust in government and leaders influencing compliance","Impact":"Potential for compliance based on political ideology rather than public health recommendations","Mitigation":"Promotion of expert advice, transparency in decision-making, and public education on the importance of evidence-based guidelines","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, public opinion polling, digital communication platforms","People":"General population, political leaders, social media users","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, media outlets"}]}
